Description:
Detects calls to "SyncInvoke" that is part of the "CL_Invocation.ps1" script to proxy execution using "System.Diagnostics.Process"

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), oscd.community, Natalia Shornikova
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Process Execution Proxy Via CL_Invocation.ps1
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where command like '%syncinvoke %'
